tool_description: An API showing all the latest Ukraine War News around the world
name: Ukraine War World News Live
title: Ukraine War World News Live

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Gets News about Ukraine War from a specific news resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ukraine-war-world-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukraine-war-world-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ukraine-war-world-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ukraine-war-world-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Ukraine War World News
api_list.description: This endpoinrt will return back all news about Ukraine War from all over the world.
